revised_title: A Case Study of a Woman with a Nine-Year-Old Foetus in Her Abdomen
tldr: A woman who had a fetus in her abdomen for nine years is studied by William Bromfeild. The fetus was contained in a membranous cyst and had caused various health issues, including suppression of urine and inflammation of the peritoneum. The case study provides insight into the complications of long-term pregnancies and the impact on the woman's body.
